content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/ukraine/kyiv.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee Handbook\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an internal information resource that was created specifically to guide newcomers through the rules and procedures employed by the company, and to inform you about the benefits and other possibilities available to you as an EPAM employee. We hope that the information in the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/ukraine/kyiv.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee Handbook\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" will be useful to you and will help make your life in the company more pleasant, and your work more efficient. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The first section, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/ukraine/kyiv/terms-and-conditions.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Terms and Conditions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", describes the rules that apply to work and leisure in the company. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
